p: Moreover, Alternaria spp. was not isolated in fruit fumigated with thyme EO. Savory EO vapors were less effective in controlling this pathogen because only 10% concentration inhibited Alternaria spp. growth, while 3.4% of fruit fumigated with 1% savory EO showed Alternaria rot. Reduced activity against Alternaria spp. was reported for savory essential oil, moreover the essential oil at 400 ppm favored Alternaria rot [ 34]. Alternaria spp. is a secondary pathogen of nectarines and the presence on the samples is mainly due to long storage.
